publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3015 Mr Tom McCabe: Financial Management 2004-5, including Provisional Outturn Figures—That the Parliament notes the improved financial management of the Scottish Executive, including the latest provisional outturn figures; encourages the Executive to continue its constructive dialogue with the Finance Committee to improve understanding, transparency and scrutiny, and notes the importance of this process to the efficient delivery of commitments outlined in A Partnership for a Better Scotland. Supported by: Tavish Scott*
